tool_description: Get every element description, images and details
name: Chemical Periodic Table
title: Chemical Periodic Table

api_list.name: Get Single Elements Details
api_list.description: Returns the element details including: name, symbol, atomic number, image, description, melting point and boiling point

api_list.name: Get All Elements
api_list.description: Returns a list of all periodic table elements including: name, symbol, atomic number, melting point and boiling point
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://chemical-periodic-table.p.rapidapi.com/elements"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chemical-periodic-table.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://chemical-periodic-table.p.rapidapi.com/elements"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "chemical-periodic-table.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
